Build a makeshift raft: Use available materials such as wood, leaves, and vines to construct a raft that can be used to cross the river.
Use a helicopter: If you have access to a helicopter, you can use it to fly over the river and land on the opposite bank.
Build a rope bridge: Use strong ropes and wooden planks to build a bridge that can span the width of the river.
Use a jet ski: If you have access to a jet ski, you can use it to navigate the river and cross it.
Use a submarine: If you have access to a submarine, you can use it to travel underwater and cross the river.
